CustomField.description: If True, when a Payee is first allocated to a Assignment, the Primary Pay Schedule defined on the Payee will be populated on the Assignment. If false the Pay Schedule will be taken from the Client.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If True, when a Payee is first allocated to a Assignment, the Primary Pay Schedule defined on the Payee will be populated on the Assignment. If false the Pay Schedule will be taken from the Client.
CustomField.label: Assignment Pay Schedule from Payee
